div.p: Distribution of the 40 farms (grey circles) and 10 meteorological stations (white triangles) in the study system in southern Qu√©bec. Mean density of breeders on a farm (% of occupied nest boxes) between 2004 and 2013 is represented by different circle sizes (see legend). Forest patches (green), rivers and lakes (blue), other land uses (mostly agriculture; yellow), elevation (100-m black isolines), latitude and longitude (in decimal degrees; thin black lines) are also represented. This figure was created with QGIS 2.0 (QGIS Team Development 2013).
